lines.text: I could tell my life story as a train of coincidences.
I'll love you always and if the petrol runs out, I'll die.
Lives have many cycles but mine has only turned once and not completely... the most important thing is missing.
They say, that inside the arctic circle, on summer nights the sun does not set. They call it the midnight sun.
Nobody knows, it's up to you.
I also want to be in love.
Do you always sleep under your bed, naked? Give me a good morning kiss.
